title: Process Engineer $90K NEW!
full_description: Great Company with EXCELLENT benefits! Benefits start day one!Education: BSME or IE Degree requiredThe Process Engineer is responsible for direct support of various manufacturing processes in the facility. The job functions include troubleshooting process related problems; development of new products and processes; design tooling, machines and components to improve existing processes; improve processes by performing trials and creating operating guidelines to document changes.
